name: @rainstormy/preset-eslint-vitest
description: A predefined, opinionated ESLint configuration suitable for any web project with Vitest suites.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.@rainstormy/preset-eslint-base: This ESLint preset ships with type definitions for ESLint presets and their configurable options.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-vitest: This ESLint plugin covers Vitest suites.

devDependencies.typescript: TypeScript is a statically typed programming language on top of JavaScript.

peerDependencies.eslint: ESLint is a peer dependency of `@rainstormy/preset-eslint-base`.
peerDependencies.vitest: Vitest is a peer dependency of `eslint-plugin-vitest`.
